options: (A) No changes took place in Indian Society before eighth and after eighteenth century.

(C) The period between eighth and eighteenth century is the most important period in Indian History.

question_text: A man saves 5% of his salary and pays 15% of his salary towards taxes; rest of the salary is spent for family. If taxes paid by him are Rs. 30,000, find his salary.
If 2/5 of a number is equal to 2/3 of another number, what is the ratio between these two numbers ?

Attraction causes infatuation. Infatuation causes anger. Anger causes frustration. Therefore attraction causes frustration. Point out the correct statement from the following:

Gandhi and Einstein were contemporaries in Twentieth century. Gandhi was a social reformer. During Twentieth century there were many social reformers. Therefore Einstein was also a social reformer. Select from the following the statement which is correct:
options: (B) All who lived in Twentieth century were social reformers.

question_text: M is the son of P. P and S are brothers. T is the mother of S. V is the daughter of S. Select the correct statement from the following:
options: (A) S is the uncle of M.
(B) T is the grand-mother of S.
(C) P is the sister of S.
